community.reportDescription: Please provide as much detail as possible to help locate the pet
home.hero.title: Welcome to PetTouch
home.hero.description: The easiest way to keep your pets safe, healthy, and always connected.
home.features.title: Everything You Need for Total Peace of Mind
home.features.subtitle: Simple solutions that make pet parenting easier and more rewarding
home.features.profile.title: Digital Pet Profiles
home.features.profile.description: All your pet's vital info, from health records to diet, in one secure place. Feel confident and prepared for any emergency.
home.features.tag.title: Smart NFC Tag Protection
home.features.tag.description: A modern safety net for your pet. One scan on our smart tag brings your lost pet home faster, giving you peace of mind wherever you go.
home.features.care.title: Health & Care Reminders
home.features.care.description: Never miss a vaccination or medication again. Stay organized and feel like the responsible pet hero you are, with timely reminders and care tracking.
home.stats.title: Join a Community of Caring Pet Owners
home.stats.stories.title: Real Stories, Real Impact
home.stats.stories.subtitle: Join thousands of pet parents who've found peace of mind with PetTouch
home.cta.title: Ready to Be the Best Pet Parent You Can Be?
home.cta.description: Join thousands of caring pet owners who trust PetTouch to keep their furry family members safe and healthy.
about.title: Our Story
about.story.p1: PetTouch was born from a simple yet powerful idea: every pet deserves to be safe, healthy, and connected with their family. Our journey began when we realized that traditional pet identification methods weren't keeping up with today's technology.
about.story.p2: Today, we're proud to offer innovative solutions that bring peace of mind to thousands of pet parents across the region. Our smart NFC tags, digital profiles, and community features are designed with one goal in mind: keeping your furry family members safe and happy.
about.team.title: Meet Our Pack
about.team.sarah.name: Sarah Ahmed
about.team.sarah.bio: A passionate pet parent and tech enthusiast who believes in using technology to strengthen the bond between pets and their families.
about.team.michael.name: Michael Hassan
about.team.michael.bio: With over a decade of experience in pet care technology, Michael leads our product development with a focus on user-friendly solutions.
about.team.emily.name: Emily Youssef
about.team.emily.bio: A certified pet behaviorist who ensures our community features truly serve the needs of pet parents.
about.values.title: Values in Action
about.values.careConnection.title: Care Through Connection
about.values.careConnection.desc: We believe that better pet care starts with better connections. Our platform brings together technology and community to create a safety net for every pet.
about.values.technology.title: Smart Solutions
about.values.technology.desc: We harness the latest technology to make pet care simpler, smarter, and more effective for every pet parent.
about.values.community.title: Community First
about.values.community.image1Alt: Community member helping find lost pet
about.values.community.desc: Our strength lies in our community. Together, we create a network of caring pet parents who look out for each other.
about.steps.profile.title: Create Your Pet's Profile
about.steps.profile.desc: Start by creating a comprehensive digital profile for your pet, including health records, diet preferences, and emergency contacts.
about.steps.tag.title: Get Your Smart Tag
about.steps.tag.desc: Receive your PetTouch NFC tag, designed for durability and easy scanning. One tap connects anyone who finds your pet directly to their profile.
about.steps.care.title: Join the Community
about.steps.care.desc: Become part of a caring community of pet parents. Share experiences, get support, and help others keep their pets safe.
about.join.title: Join Our Growing Family
about.join.desc: Experience the peace of mind that comes with knowing your pet is protected by the latest technology and supported by a caring community.
community.title: Community Action Hub
community.description: Help keep our pet community safe and connected. Report lost pets or share information about found pets.
community.alertsDescription: Help reunite pets with their families by checking active alerts in your area.
community.searchPlaceholder: Search by description, location, or pet details...
community.noReports: No reports found matching your criteria
store.title: Pet Care Store
store.description: Everything your pet needs for a happy, healthy life. Quality products, carefully selected for pet parents who care.
store.tryDifferentFilters: Try different filters or reset to see all products
store.faq.q1: How do I track my order?
store.faq.a1: Once your order ships, you'll receive a tracking number via email. You can use this to track your package's journey to you.
store.faq.q2: What payment methods do you accept?
store.faq.a2: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and digital payment methods including Apple Pay and Google Pay.
store.faq.a3: Standard shipping typically takes 3-5 business days within major cities, and 5-7 business days for other areas.
store.faq.a4: We offer a 30-day return policy for unused items in their original packaging. Some restrictions apply to certain products.
store.shipping.title: Shipping Information
store.shipping.description: We strive to deliver your orders quickly and safely.
store.shipping.point1: Free shipping on orders over EGP 500
store.shipping.point2: Express delivery available for most areas
store.shipping.point3: Careful packaging to ensure product safety
store.returns.title: Returns & Exchanges
store.returns.description: We want you to be completely satisfied with your purchase.
store.returns.point2: Easy return process with prepaid shipping labels
store.returns.point3: Quick refunds once return is processed
upgradePrompt.title: Pet Limit Reached
upgradePrompt.limitMessage: You've reached the maximum of {{maxPets}} pets for your current {{currentPlan}} plan.
upgradePrompt.upgradeMessage: To add more pets, please upgrade your subscription plan.
upgradePrompt.upgradeButton: Upgrade Plan to Add More Pets
